sections.heading: Inventory
sections.text:
and appraisement or record of value to be made and filed; waiver; request for

list of assets; copy mailed to interested heirs and devisees; redacted

inventory; court order for inventory.

sections.heading: Appraisers:
sections.text:
When appointment authorized; compensation; record of value in lieu of appraisement;

exceptions.

sections.heading: Certified
sections.text:
public accountant or other expert in valuation: When appointment authorized;

compensation.

sections.heading: Certification
sections.text:
of appraiser, certified public accountant or expert in valuation; form of

appraisement or valuation; purchase by appraiser, certified public accountant

or expert in valuation without disclosure prohibited; penalties.

sections.heading: Oath
sections.text: of personal representative endorsed upon or annexed to inventory.

sections.heading: Failure
sections.text:
to file inventory: Revocation of letters; payment of fees and costs; liability

on bond.
